name: Linked Gauntlet
description:
Find a friend (or a stranger) to play this wonky local multiplayer game with!

Both players are pitted against each other in the gauntlet arena to see who can survive the longest.

Linked Gauntlet was created in under 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

Notes:

- I wanted to implement a co-op mode, but I ran out of time. However, you can pretend that a co-op mode exists by teaming up with the other player to see how long you can both survive the gauntlet.
